\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$typename Tnu, typename Tx, typename Tp$>$\newline
struct emsr\+::cyl\+\_\+mod\+\_\+bessel\+\_\+t$<$ Tnu, Tx, Tp $>$}

This struct captures the state of the modified cylindrical Bessel functions at a given order and argument.
